document.masterDocTitle: New species of ants from China and Mauritius.

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: New species of ants from China and Mauritius.
Annals and Magazine of Natural History

subSubSection.paragraph: Described from nine workers collected in " navel " of an orange from South Africa; Mauritius, 24. vi. 46 (R. Mamet). No. 103.
